title: Sono Keisatsukan, Tokidoki Yajuu!
original_name: その警察官、ときどき野獣!
sinopse:
"Show me your place."

I thought it was okay because he's a police officer... but will I be violated if he stays here?

The ordinary office lady, Hiyori, lives in a peaceful city. She was caught in an accident by chance and fractured her arm. She decided to live with Kumano, a policeman who happened to be there. Hiyori was relieved because he was a police officer, however...

(Source: Ichijinsha, translated)
